Models¶

class rest.core.models.Snippet(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This model class represents the db schema for Snippet table.

save(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
Use the pygments library to create a highlighted HTML

representation of the code snippet.

rest.core.models.create_auth_token(sender, instance=None, created=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

This is a signal method which recieves the signal whenever a new user is saved in the database. As soon as it gets the signal it gets executed, and corresponding token for the user gets created.
